mapper.select: select ciNo, ciName, ciUrl, ciPort, ciDatabase, ciUser, ciPwd, ciEtc, uId, ciNo as id, ciName as text from connection_info where uId=#{uId}
select ciNo, ciName, ciUrl, ciPort, ciDatabase, ciUser, ciPwd, ciEtc, uId, ciNo as id, ciName as text from connection_info where ciNo=#{ciNo}
insert into connection_info(ciUrl, ciName, uId, ciPort, ciDatabase, ciUser, ciPwd, ciEtc) values(#{ciUrl}, #{ciName}, #{uId}, #{ciPort}, #{ciDatabase}, #{ciUser}, #{ciPwd}, #{ciEtc})

select table_name as tableName, table_comment as tableComment, (data_length+index_length)/1024 as tableSize from information_schema.tables where table_schema=#{dbName} and (table_type='BASE TABLE' or table_type='SYSTEM_VIEW')
